startFrom.description: Controls the start time of the simulation.

startTime.title: startTime
startTime.description: Start time for the simulation with startFrom startTime

stopAt.description: Controls the end time of the simulation.

endTime.title: endTime
endTime.description: End time for the simulation when stopAt endTime; is specified.

writeControl.description: Controls the timing of write output to file.

writeInterval.title: writeInterval
writeInterval.description: Scalar used in conjunction with writeControl described above.

purgeWrite.title: purgeWrite
purgeWrite.description: Integer representing a limit on the number of time directories that are stored by overwriting time directories on a cyclic basis.

writeFormat.description: Specifies the format of the data files.

writePrecision.title: writePrecision
writePrecision.description: Integer used in conjunction with writeFormat described above.

writeCompression.title: writeCompression
writeCompression.description: Switch to specify whether files are compressed with gzip

timeFormat.description: Controls the timing of write output to file.

timePrecision.title: timePrecision
timePrecision.description: Integer used in conjunction with timeFormat described above

runTimeModifiable.title: runTimeModifiable
runTimeModifiable.description: Switch for whether dictionaries, e.g. controlDict, are re-read during a simulation at the beginning of each time step, allowing the user to modify parameters during a simulation.

graphFormat.description: Format for graph data written by an application.

adjustTimeStep.title: adjustTimeStep
adjustTimeStep.description: Switch used by some solvers to adjust the time step during the simulation, usually according to maxCo.

items.description: List of additional libraries (on $LD_LIBRARY_PATH) to be loaded at run-time
Dictionary of functions, e.g.  probes to be loaded at run-time
